I have the latest version of Firefox. I tried FIREFOX-VOORKEUREN-GEAVANCEERD-NAAR TEKST ZOEKEN WANNEER IK BEGIN TE TYPEN (dutch), but this doesn't work.

Reproducible: Always



Expected Results:  
You should be able to use the symbol /. When I try typelesonline on Safari, this symbol works.
